  • Snatch Chat Hash Run
    Snatch Chat Hash Run
    Starts: 5:00 pm
    Ends: April 1, 2017 - 8:30 pm

    Location: Marlborough Park, 2222 Whenona Dr, Madison, WI 53711, USA


    Description:

    No one volunteered to take this hash that I so foolishly signed up for, so you’re stuck with my shiggy trail. Never fear, there will be plenty of drinking along the way and an on-in (if you don’t get too lost). And for more drinking pleasure there’s an optional pre-lube at 4:00 at The Badger Tavern. 1612 Seminole Hwy, Madison, WI 53711.
